title: Lucas Petherbridge | Software Engineer Resume

header.name: Lucas Petherbridge
header.summary: Polygot Software Engineer with 10+ years experience solving problems by developing innovative solutions in a variety of domains. I started programming at age 15 and love keeping up with the latest technology. I'm constantly looking for new challenges and opportunities for learning.

bullets: Led architecture initiatives for increasing website performance by 10% using LighthouseCI and PageSpeed Insights

bullets: Designed & implemented customer authentication platform for an automotive e-commerce website using Auth0, React & Typescript deployed with Microsoft Azure & Kubernetes.
Brought team testing standards for unit & end-to-end tests from zero to 60% coverage using Jest & Cypress.

positions.title: Senior Software Engineer

positions.title: Senior Software Engineer
